about_the_game:
Welcome to Plunder Masters, the real-time tactics game where cunning strategy and bold decision-making are key to becoming the ultimate master of heists. In this real-time strategy game, you'll create and control your own team of thieves, each with unique abilities and skills, ready to take on daring heists and steal valuable loot from unsuspecting targets.

Gameplay:

As a real-time tactics game, you have the power to control multiple characters at once. Whether you're orchestrating a synchronized break-in with a team of two or coordinating a grand heist with a larger crew, the choice is in your hands. Simply click on a character to control their actions, allowing for complex strategies and coordinated maneuvers. Experience the thrill of multi-character control as you master the art of managing your crew in real-time.

Interactive world:

he world is your playground. Each environment is richly interactive, offering opportunities for strategic gameplay. Hide, create distractions, or find alternative paths to reach your target.

Distract or take them out:

Your objective is clear: steal. Choose the subtle art of distraction, mislead guards, and slip past security systems unnoticed. Or, opt for a more direct approach and take out your obstacles.

Features:


Assemble your dream team:
Handpick your own crew of thieves, selecting from a wide range of characters with diverse abilities and specialized skills.

Dynamic, randomly generated world:
Each game offers a unique experience with semi-procedurally generated maps. Use the environment to your advantage, planning your moves carefully and adapting to changing situations.

Steal from a variety of targets:
Test your skills against a diverse range of targets. Each heist presents its own unique challenges and rewards.

Strategic gameplay:
Plan and execute the perfect crime using tactics, stealth, and timing.

Sharpen your strategic mind, assemble your crew, and take on the world of crime in this thrilling real-time strategy game!

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature content in the game are:
Shootings: In the game there will be NPCs shooting at the player.
Mention of Illegal drugs: In certain missions there could be mentions of drugs. Even if no names of drugs are explicitly said, it can easily be understood from the customer that the game is talking about them.
